channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Can Congress defund federal courts with key Trump budget process?
item.description: As federal judges issue numerous nationwide orders halting Trump agenda items, Congress is looking for ways to address potential abuses.

item.title: Homan to Newsmax: We'll Return to Boston to Remove Illegals

item.title: Is It a Sign? Huge Numbers of American Bald Eagles Come Together on Frozen Midwestern Lake
Texas lawmakers consider measure prohibiting SNAP benefits from being used to purchase junk food
item.description: A bill in the Texas legislature would prohibit purchasing junk food, including soda, energy drinks, candy, chips and cookies, with SNAP benefits.

item.title: Rep. Gill to Newsmax: Rogue Federal Judges Threaten Democracy

item.title: Scott Turner to Newsmax: HUD for Americans Only
item.description: U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development Secretary Scott Turner told Newsmax that the Trump administration took steps Monday to put an end to ...

item.title: Tennessee bill aims to hold charities liable if migrants they house commit crimes
item.description: A bill introduced in the Tennessee legislature could hold charitable organizations liable if they are caught housing an illegal migrant who commits a ...

item.title: Washington AG joins coalition suing to block Trump's order to dismantle Department of Education
item.description: Washington state has joined 20 other states in a lawsuit to block President Donald Trump's executive order to dismantle the Department of Education.

item.title: 'Long Live the Intifada'—Hate Continues at Columbia U As Faculty Holds 'Emergency Vigil'
Schumer warns any GOP bid to shutter the Department of Education will be DOA in Senate

item.title: Complaint: LA County Public Health's Ferrer Oversaw Retaliation Against Contract Fraud Whistleblower
Political Lessons From President George W. Bush (Part IV)
Tlaib Faces Backlash for Comment on Airstrikes Against Houthis: ‘They’re Bombing Terrorists, Rashida’
Senate Confirms Phelan as Navy Secretary, Landau at State
item.description: The Senate confirmed John Phelan as secretary of the Navy and Christopher Landau as deputy secretary of state on Monday.
